page.title: 12FAMILY LIFE
page.content: A typical day starts for me( Roger Cook aged 10) rising at eight o clock, washing, having breakfast, and going downstairs to get dressed. I usually have weetabix,cornflakes or readibrek,which is a type of instant porridge for breakfast. I set off for school at about a quarter to nine. In school I do things like{Maths, Creative writing,}and drawing,plus different things such as using our{computer. When I get home from school I watch T.V. or read a book till tea is ready. I have not gone into detail but that is a normal day for me. There are four people in my family.Dad is a supervisor for South West Gas in Bridgwater. We have all the usual modern amenities:T.V. and so on.At the weekend we go to our {Grandparents}who live in Yeovil.
